teaser: Congress moves to vote on the Keystone XL pipeline. The Supreme Court lifts a stay on gay marriage in Kansas. And the United States Department of Veterans Affairs announces new plans for improved service. A panel of journalists joins guest host Tom Gjelten for analysis of the week's top national news stories.
